mapper.select: select * from dramaboard order by dramaNo desc
mapper.insert: insert into dramaboard (dramaTitle, dramaShortTitle, dramaContent, dramaWriter) values (#{dramaTitle}, #{dramaShortTitle}, #{dramaContent}, #{dramaWriter})
mapper.select: select dramaNo, dramaTitle, dramaShortTitle, dramaContent, dramaWriter, dramaregDate, dramaViewCnt from dramaboard where dramaNo = #{dramaNo}
select dramaNo, dramaTitle, dramaWriter, dramaregDate, dramaViewCnt from dramaboard order by dramaNo desc limit #{displayPost}, #{postNum}

select dramaNo, dramaTitle, dramaWriter, dramaregDate, dramaViewCnt from dramaboard
where dramaTitle LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
where dramaContent LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
where dramaTitle LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or dramaContent LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
where dramaWriter LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
order by dramaNo desc limit #{displayPost}, #{postNum}
